Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 44th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1991...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Chicago (N) on 5/12/1994 (Going to PIT: 1B J. Thome, LF R. Greer. Going to CHC: 1B D. Ortiz, 2B T. Graffanino, CF G. Matthews Jr.)...
Injured on 7/14/1994 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/30/1997 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6-7 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Los Angeles on 6/2/1997 (Going to LA: P J. Wright, 3B B. Smith, 2B T. Graffanino. Going to CHC: P C. Carpenter)...
Had first career hit on 4/14/1999, off John Habyan (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/30/1999, off Kerry Ligtenberg (CHC)...
